description_for_human: 從 Microsoft Graph API 獲取過往會議資訊並生成會議紀錄摘要。使用會議的主題 (subject) 來生成摘要。
description_for_model: Retrieve meeting transcripts using subject and generate structured meeting summaries. The summary should follow a specified format including meeting details, objectives, agenda, and discussion points. The outcome will be written in Mandarin, with terms generally used in Taiwan.
